title: Fancy Wine on Wheels Grand Tasting & Silent Auction
seo_title: Fancy Wine on Wheels Grand Tasting & Silent Auction
short_description: If you are visiting New York and you want to rub elbow with some of NYC's big hearted elite, head over to City Winery for this classy wine tasting affair.
long_description:
If you are visiting New York and you want to rub elbow with some of NYC's big hearted elite, head over to City Winery for this classy wine tasting affair. The price of the ticket is steep, but 100% of the proceeds benefits Wheeling Forward, a nonprofit helping people with disabilities meet their short and long term goals by offering a comprehensive set of services. The event will feature over 200 wines served by over 60 of New York's most heralded sommeliers. There will also be light bites, a silent auction, and opportunities to meet and greet famous sommelier's such as Jean-Luc Le DÃ». Buy tickets in advance or buy general admission tickets at the door the day of the event. Certain tickets include access to the Sommposium, which offers week-long access to pop-up and pre-event wine tastings. For an extensive list of events, click here:
https://wineonwheels2017.splashthat.com/



Wine on Wheels, April 29th, from 1pm - 4pm, City Winery, 155 Varick St, (212) 608-0555
